hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWR.EOWR_ID,EOWR.CREATOR,EOWR.CREATE_TIME,EOWR.MODIFIER,EOWR.MODIFY_TIME,EOWR.REC_VER,EOWR.REC_STATUS, EOWR.ORG_ID,EOWR.EOWR_CODE,EOWR.EOWR_NAME,EOWR.EOWR_NAME_EN,EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_CODE,EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOWR.EOWR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE,EOWR.EOWR_ORDER_TYPE_NAME,EOWR.EOWR_PRIORITY,EOWR.EOWR_PROJECT_CODE, EOWR.EOWR_PROJECT_NAME,EOWR.EOWR_DEFAULT_WH_CODE, EOWR.EOWR_DEFAULT_WH_NAME,EOWR.EOWR_IS_ALLOT_NOTCOVER_WH,EOWR.EOWR_IS_SPLIT_BY_STOCK,EOWR.EOWR_REMARK FROM EO_ORDER_WH_RULE EOWR WHERE 1=1 << AND EOWR.ORG_ID = :orgId >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_CODE = :eowrCode >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_NAME LIKE :eowrName >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_NAME_EN LIKE :eowrNameEn >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_CODE = :eowrCustomerCode >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE = :eowrOrderTypeCode >> << AND EOWR.REC_STATUS = :recStatus >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_PRIORITY = :eowrPriority >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_REMARK = :eowrRemark >> ORDER BY EOWR.EOWR_PRIORITY DESC
